definition: surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: I don't think it's vicarious punishment. I call it literal punishment.
sentences.chinese: 我认为它不应该是替代惩罚，我叫它原义惩罚。

sentences.english: I think the key to translating is not to get hung up on the literal meaning.
sentences.chinese: 我认为翻译的关键是一定要忠实表达它的原义。

sentences.english: What is the original meaning of this word?

sentences.chinese: 输入掩码通常包含原义字符。

sentences.english: There is a image to life has a profound understanding and comprehension.
sentences.chinese: 有一种意象，感悟着生活原义中的心灵回归。
逐字翻译不一定最接近原义。

sentences.english: Also in the bible there's no, what I call, literal punishment.
sentences.chinese: 圣经》里没有我所说的原义惩罚。

sentences.english: Specifies an escape character that is used to indicate that a parameter marker character in a name is meant literally.
sentences.chinese: 指定用于表示名称中参数标记原义的转义符。

sentences.english: That's not vicarious. You're not substituting. It's literal.
sentences.chinese: 这不是替代，你并没有进行替换，它是遵循原义的。

sentences.english: This is a confusion or corruption of the original meaning of the term.
sentences.chinese: 这是对“后人类”一词原义的混淆与讹误。

definition: meaning (of foreign expression)/translation of the meaning (as opposed to literal translation 直譯|直译)/paraphrase/free translation
the meaning of sth/an explanation of the meaning of words or phrases/definition/an interpretation (of doctrine)/religious doctrine
idea/opinion/meaning/wish/desire/interest/fun/token of appreciation, affection etc/CL:個|个[ge4]/to give as a small token/to do sth as a gesture of goodwill etc
to extend (the meaning of a word, an analogy etc)/derivation
lit. view a text and interpret (idiom); to interpret word by word without understanding the meaning/a far-fetched interpretation
